From: robert.kim@techstart.io
Subject: URGENT: Integration issue

"John,

Our MrCall integration stopped working around 5 AM PST. Calls are going straight to voicemail instead of the AI assistant.

We have a product launch today and expecting high call volume. This is critical for us.

Can someone look at this ASAP?

- Robert"

Here's a draft for Jennifer:

To: jennifer.walsh@meridianpartners.com
Subject: Following up + Case Studies (as promised!)

Hi Jennifer,

Apologies for the delayed follow-up - wanted to make sure I pulled together the right case studies for your team.

As promised from our conversation on the 22nd, here are three relevant examples:

1. **Henderson Corp** (Enterprise - Operations)
   How they reduced call handling time by 60% and improved customer satisfaction scores

2. **BrightWave Technologies** (SaaS - Product Support)
   AI-powered tier-1 support handling 80% of inbound queries

3. **City of Millbrook** (Government - Citizen Services)
   Municipal deployment handling permits, appointments, and general inquiries

I remember you were particularly interested in the enterprise rollout process - Henderson Corp is probably the closest match to your situation.

Would love to continue our conversation about the partnership opportunity. Are you available for a follow-up call this week?

Best,
John

P.S. - Hope you had a great Thanksgiving!

I've formatted it to reference your actual meeting conversation. Should I:
1. Save as draft
2. Send now
3. Attach actual case study PDFs (if you have them)
save as draft, I'll attach the PDFs manually
